duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the product strategy, roadmap, and execution of initiatives related to the Interactive Voice Response product.
Work with stakeholders, customers, and delivery teams to understand customer problems and business opportunities.
Meet with top customers to understand their specific problems, analyze potential future opportunities for growth, and evaluate partnership opportunities.
Collaborate with business stakeholders and the R&D team to build a complete product roadmap aligned with company goals and value creation.
Identify workflow improvement opportunities, prioritize them, and work with appropriate teams to make changes, including onboarding, optimizations, and other out-of-the-box thinking.
Gain a holistic understanding of the payments market to identify disruptive opportunities in the payments experience.
Define methods and metrics for identifying success and failure and ensure the team is clear on their objectives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or quantitatively oriented fields (Advanced degree in business or relevant field preferred)
